page.title: 08HOBBIES OF A BEAFORD GIRL
page.content: My favourite hobby is stamp collecting. I have three albums. At the moment I am looking for Heraldry stamps. There is a stamp club at school, with a competition. Another two hobbies of mine are reading and drawing. I like to read Enid Blyton and Laura Ingalls Wilder's books best. There is also a horse series by Walter Farley - "The Black Stallion". It is about a huge black horse, and his friend, a boy called Alec Ramsay. In every book they have a long, complicated and exciting adventure. I draw horses a lot, and get the Horse and Pony magazine every fortnight. Every Thursday from 6.30 to 8 p.m. I go riding. There are 10 horses at the riding stables. I also enjoy swimming and go every fortnight with the school to the pool in Torrington.
